data.name: Santiago Sucerquia
data.Profile: Hello, I'm a young front-end developer from Medellin city, always looking for personal growth. I like to be in search of new references, good books, everything that allows me to be better every day and well, to be able to give you some of what I learned to my friends and colleagues. As a frontend developer I have experience in the ReactJS framework, state management, route management with React Routes, knowledge of agile methodologies as well as javascript, code versioning such as git and github.

certificate.description: Hack up furballs try to jump onto window and fall while scratching at wall.
certificate.name: FrontEnd Developer

certificate.description: Scratch at the door then walk away wack the mini furry mouse
certificate.name: Backend Developer

Academic.description: My goal is to be a frontend with great skill in managing the DOM, I take advantage of courses to develop personal projects and thus acquire more practice and ability to solve problems, my focus is on having the ability to use reactjs in a very agile and very efficient way.
I acquired general knowledge of software development: topics such as data structures, object-oriented programming, algorithmic logic. I also made some emphasis on web programming.

experience.jobDescription: my main activities to develop personal applications in web technologies, mainly with the reactjs library, redux, javascript vanilla for some cases integrations with API

my responsibilities are to train clients in the use of the platform, identify improvements on the platform and propose it to the digital transformation area and identify errors that applications can generate
